original_text: The people gave us many gifts. Later, we got ready to leave the island on another ship. They gave us the things that we needed for the journey.
korean_text: 후한 예로 우리를 대접하고 떠날 때에 우리 쓸 것을 배에 실었더라

sentences.original_text: The people gave us many gifts
Later, we got ready to leave the island
sentences.korean_translation: 나중에, 우리는 섬을 떠날 준비를 했습니다

sentences.original_text: that we needed for the journey
